problem_statement: A game feature requires tracking rapid user clicks without causing unnecessary re-renders or incorrect counts. The component must precisely reset streaks after exactly one second of inactivity while remaining stable during rapid interaction.
FAIL_TO_PASS: Reset exactly after 1 second inactivity > test_reset_after_one_second
Reset exactly after 1 second inactivity > test_no_reset_if_click_before_timeout
Reset exactly after 1 second inactivity > test_timer_reset_on_each_click
